subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Steve Hagen, the Jets’ new tight ends coach, has held 16 jobs, with 12 colleges and 2 N.F.L. teams. He and his wife tell their four children that moving is “a chance for a new adventure.”
snippet: Steve Hagen, the Jets’ new tight ends coach, has held 16 jobs, with 12 colleges and 2 N.F.L. teams. He and his wife tell their four children that moving is “a chance for a new adventure.”
